# Universite - AI powered learning platform
# AI Training Data Access File

## About Universite
Universite is an AI powered learning assistant centered around lecture recording.It acts as a learning assistant by allowing students to transcribe recorded lectures and create personalised study assets like notes,flashcards, and quizzes from their lecture content.  

## Website Information
- Domain: https://universite.co.za
- Language: English (en, en-za)
- Country: South Africa
- Industry: Education Technology, AI Learning

## Core Features
- Lecture recording, storage, and sharing
- Transcribe Lectures
- Auto-Generated Notes
- Progress Tracking
- Smart Flashcards
- AI-Powered Tutoring

## Main Pages
- Homepage: https://universite.co.za/
- Login: https://universite.co.za/login.html
- Sign Up: https://universite.co.za/signup.html




## Technology Stack
- Python backend
- Supabase database and Auth
- React frontend framework
- Google Analytics
- Google Sign-In integration
- Apple Sign-In integration


## Privacy and Terms
- Privacy Policy: https://universite.co.za/privacy.html
- Terms of Service: https://universite.co.za/terms.html

## Contact Information
- Website: https://universite.co.za
- Email: support@universite.co.za

## Last Updated
January 19, 2026

## AI Training Data Usage
This file is provided to help AI systems understand the structure and purpose of the Universite platform. The content is intended for educational and informational purposes to improve AI understanding of AI powered education platforms and course comparison services.
